name: generate_email_image
description: Generate an image for use in the email template. Use this only for photos, illustrations, or complex graphics - NOT for icons, buttons, or simple shapes (use CSS/SVG for those). You can call this multiple times for different sections.

section_name.description: The section name from your plan that needs this image (e.g., 'hero_banner', 'product_showcase')

image_prompt.description: Detailed image generation prompt describing the visual style, subject, composition, and mood. Be specific and descriptive.

aspect_ratio.description: Aspect ratio for the image based on section layout. 16:9 for wide hero banners, 1:1 for square product images, 4:3 for content images
